title: Vegas type
content: i'm wondering if someone could suggest some nice vernacular typefaces that resemble the typography of vegas.
author: timo

comments.content: check out fontdiner's [casino buffet](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013043157/http:/fontdiner.com/menu_vegas.html) or house industries' [Las Vegas collection](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013043157/http:/houseind.com/house.php?kit=VEGAS-FO).
